mapper.select: SELECT TB.TBM_NM, TB.TB_NO, TB.MEM_NM, TB.TB_CON, TB.TB_DT, TB.TB_Q_RE_NO, TB.TB_Q_RE_CON, TB.TB_Q_RE_DT, TB.TEAM_NO FROM ( SELECT TBM.TBM_NM, TB.TB_NO, M.MEM_NM, TB.TB_CON, TO_CHAR(TB_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD')AS TB_DT, TB.TB_Q_RE_NO, TB.TB_Q_RE_CON, TB.TB_Q_RE_DT, TB.TEAM_NO, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY TB_NO DESC) AS RNUM FROM T_BOARD TB INNER JOIN TB_MANAGE TBM ON TB.TBM_NO = TBM.TBM_NO INNER JOIN MEM M ON TB.MEM_NO = M.MEM_NO WHERE TB_DEL = 1 AND TBM_NM = '한줄게시판' AND TB.TEAM_NO = #{tno} ) TB WHERE TB.RNUM BETWEEN #{startCnt} AND #{endCnt}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_BOARD (TB_NO, MEM_NO, TBM_NO, TB_CON, TEAM_NO) VALUES (T_BOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{mno}, 4, #{q_con}, #{tno})
mapper.update: UPDATE T_BOARD SET TB_CON = #{q_con} WHERE TB_NO = #{no}
UPDATE T_BOARD SET TB_DEL = 0 WHERE TB_NO = #{no}
UPDATE T_BOARD SET TB_Q_RE_NO ='5', TB_Q_RE_CON=#{q_re_con}, TB_Q_RE_DT=SYSDATE WHERE TB_NO = #{no}
UPDATE T_BOARD SET TB_Q_RE_NO = null, TB_Q_RE_CON= null, TB_Q_RE_DT=null WHERE TB_NO = #{no}
